@drdralal I came back last night but yeah I was there for all 4 semis. We try to go every year. It's great fun.
@drdralal But I don't think this will be a 5 set battle. And if it is, it'll be a short one. Points moving far too quickly for an epic one.
@drdralal I was so lucky to have been there. Definitely one to remember, even though I needed a late-night coffee run to get me through.
@drdralal I think this is moving super quickly actually. Doubt it'll be anything like the Dimitrov/Nadal semi the other night.

@_SocialDemocrat I'm hoping you're right because I genuinely don't think I can handle the jealousy of this being amazing.
I hope that this is a totally underwhelming match because I'm not there and I don't have it in me to rise above such pettiness. #AusOpen
